tool_description: Analyzes customer return behavior patterns to identify frequent returners, customer segments, and return propensity.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs to analyze

customer_segment.description: Customer segment to focus analysis: all, vip, regular, new

analysis_depth.description: Depth of customer analysis: basic, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid customer segment: Use one of [all, vip, regular, new]
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive]
Customer data unavailable: Customer information not found for provided return IDs
usage: Provide return_ids to analyze customer return patterns. Optionally filter by customer_segment and set analysis_depth for the level of detail required.

frequent_returners.description: Customer IDs with unusually high return rates

average_returns_per_customer.description: Mean number of returns per customer

customer_segments_analysis.description: Analysis of return behavior by customer segment
